pillar_1_developmental_milestones.name: Developmental Milestones & Learning
pillar_1_developmental_milestones.focus: Tracking and celebrating baby's developmental progress while providing educational value to parents
pillar_1_developmental_milestones.target_audience: Parents seeking developmental guidance and reassurance
pillar_1_developmental_milestones.prompt_template: Create a engaging YouTube video script for Miss Gracy Baby focusing on {subcategory} within Developmental Milestones & Learning. The video should follow the proven 5-minute structure: 15-second hook, 15-second setup, 3-minute main content, 30-second educational element, and 30-second conclusion. Target audience is parents seeking {audience_focus}. Include specific details about Gracy's current age ({baby_age}), the developmental milestone or skill being demonstrated, and practical takeaways for parents. The tone should be {tone} and include {specific_elements}.

pillar_2_daily_adventures.name: Daily Adventures & Exploration
pillar_2_daily_adventures.focus: Capturing baby's everyday discoveries, playtime, and exploration moments
pillar_2_daily_adventures.target_audience: Parents and family members who enjoy authentic baby moments
pillar_2_daily_adventures.prompt_template: Generate a captivating YouTube video script for Miss Gracy Baby featuring {subcategory} from Daily Adventures & Exploration. Follow the 5-minute video structure: attention-grabbing 15-second hook, context-setting 15-second setup, engaging 3-minute main content showing exploration, and a heartwarming 30-second conclusion. Capture Gracy's authentic reactions during {activity_description} at {baby_age}. The video should highlight {key_elements} and maintain a {tone} tone that resonates with parents experiencing similar moments.

pillar_3_parenting_hacks.name: Parenting Hacks & Tips
pillar_3_parenting_hacks.focus: Practical advice, product reviews, and parenting solutions
pillar_3_parenting_hacks.target_audience: New and experienced parents seeking practical guidance
pillar_3_parenting_hacks.prompt_template: Create an informative YouTube video script for Miss Gracy Baby showcasing {subcategory} from Parenting Hacks & Tips. Structure the video with a compelling 15-second hook that presents the {parenting_challenge}, 15-second setup explaining the solution approach, 3-minute main content with detailed demonstration and explanation, 30-second educational element with key takeaways, and a helpful 30-second conclusion with resources. Include specific {practical_elements} and maintain a {tone} tone that builds trust with parents seeking {audience_need}.

pillar_4_family_bonding.name: Family Bonding & Traditions
pillar_4_family_bonding.focus: Creating and documenting family traditions, special moments, and bonding experiences
pillar_4_family_bonding.target_audience: Family-oriented viewers who value emotional connections
pillar_4_family_bonding.prompt_template: Develop a heartwarming YouTube video script for Miss Gracy Baby centered on {subcategory} from Family Bonding & Traditions. Structure the video with an emotional 15-second hook that captures the essence of family bonding, 15-second setup introducing the family members and context, 3-minute main content showcasing authentic interactions and moments, 30-second educational element about relationship building, and a touching 30-second conclusion that emphasizes family values. Focus on {emotional_elements} and maintain a {tone} tone that celebrates family connections.

pillar_5_fun_challenges.name: Fun Challenges & Entertainment
pillar_5_fun_challenges.focus: Lighthearted, entertaining content including challenges and trending formats
pillar_5_fun_challenges.target_audience: Broader audience seeking entertainment and shareable content
pillar_5_fun_challenges.prompt_template: Create an entertaining YouTube video script for Miss Gracy Baby featuring {subcategory} from Fun Challenges & Entertainment. Structure the video with a high-energy 15-second hook that creates excitement, 15-second setup explaining the challenge or activity, 3-minute main content filled with engaging moments and baby reactions, 30-second educational element with light learning points, and a fun 30-second conclusion with audience interaction. Focus on {entertainment_elements} and maintain a {tone} tone that maximizes entertainment value and shareability.
